segments.text: I have a question about my payment and need someone to help me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would be happy to answer a question about payment . What do you need help with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t figure out why my paycheck this week is smaller than last week ’ s .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you generate any income during that time period ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I made a little bit of money , but not much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did that income show up on your last Continued Claim Form ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I claimed the work I did on the last Continued Claim Form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you are able to find work and get paid , we always take away part of your check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That being the case , I don ’ t think that I am going to show the income next time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t do it ! If you get caught making false statements , you can have your claim closed .
segments.speaker: S2
